item.description: Killington is putting on a series of free concerts called "Cooler in the Mountains", and SH will be wrapping up the season at the end of August. I think the ideal plan is to have lunch at Long Trail (Rt. 4, Bridgewater Corners) at approximately 1p, then go up to the venue, which is Killington's K-1 Base Lodge. More information, including the other shows here: http://bit.ly/rn0MQi...

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Sister Hazel Concert - FREE
